queries.prefix: PREFIX c:<http://www.semanticweb.org/yzhao30/ontologies/2015/7/c#> PREFIX file0:<file:///home/demo/Downloads/PATO-ROSE-master/tools/onto-build-rose/test/writeToFile.c#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX pa:<http://www.semanticweb.org/aidb/ontologies/BugFindingOntology#> PREFIX fl:<http://www.semanticweb.org/aidb/ontologies/FileLibraryOntology#>
queries.query: SELECT ?lhsVal ?rhsVal ?rhsType ?relVal WHERE { ?query pa:hasQueryCondition ?cond. ?cond pa:hasLHS ?lhs. ?lhs pa:queryConditionType pa:variable . ?lhs pa:queryConditionSource pa:sparql . ?lhs pa:value ?lhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRHS ?rhs . ?rhs pa:queryConditionType ?rhsType . ?rhs pa:value ?rhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRelation ?rel . ?rel pa:value ?relVal . }

SELECT ?lhsVal ?rhsVal ?relVal WHERE { ?query pa:hasQueryCondition ?cond. ?cond pa:hasLHS ?lhs. ?lhs pa:queryConditionType pa:variable . ?lhs pa:queryConditionSource pa:sparql . ?lhs pa:value ?lhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRHS ?rhs . ?rhs pa:queryConditionType pa:value . ?rhs pa:dataType xsd:int . ?rhs pa:value ?rhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRelation ?rel . ?rel pa:value ?relVal . }

SELECT ?lhsVal ?rhsVal ?rhsType ?relVal WHERE { ?query pa:hasQueryCondition ?cond. ?cond pa:hasLHS ?lhs. ?lhs pa:queryConditionType pa:variable . ?lhs pa:queryConditionSource pa:sparql . ?lhs pa:value ?lhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRHS ?rhs . ?rhs pa:queryConditionType ?rhsType . ?rhs pa:queryConditionSource pa:sparql . ?rhs pa:value ?rhsVal . ?cond pa:hasRelation ?rel . ?rel pa:value ?relVal . }
